overview: The last of an elite squad of soldiers known as the OMEN Forces are tasked to rescue a fellow soldier who was the only survivor of a battle against the enemy. On the way to rescue him, the elite squad gets ambushed by the enemies. They then discover a plot to wipe out the soldiers and to infect every single person in Roblox with a virus- a virus that will turn them into ODers.
tagline: THE END WAS ONLY THE BEGINNING.
title: War for Roblox
